message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $900,000 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer. While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is truly significant. I could consider coming down to $1,150,000. This feels like a fair compromise, considering its potential worth to you.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am still working within my budget constraints. I am willing to pay up to $1,000,000 for the product, which is very close to its value to me. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
